main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in South Hadley, Massachusetts on 1 May 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white, silver top or disc,The sighting lasted for 20 minutes,The object hovered, moved to the northeast, and made sharp left and right turns,The observer was a student at Holyoke Trade High School and had experience identifying aircraft,There was no visual identification of the object as a known aircraft, and the investigation deemed the report as insufficient data.
sighted object: a bright white, silver top or disc object
witness description: a student at Holyoke Trade High School
